mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLICATION ( SEQ, EMAIL, TITLE, REGDATE, RECRUIT_SEQ, INTRODUCE, PORTPOLIO_LINK, PORTPOLIO_FILE, REWARDING, HANDICAP, MILITARY, DELFLAG ) VALUES( APPLICATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{title}, #{regdate}, #{recruit_seq}, #{introduce}, #{portpolio_link}, #{portpolio_file}, #{rewarding}, #{handicap}, #{military}, #{delflag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE APPLICATION SET EMAIL = #{email}, TITLE = #{title}, REGDATE = #{regdate}, RECRUIT_SEQ = #{recruit_seq}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, PORTPOLIO_LINK = #{portpolio_link}, PORTPOLIO_FILE = #{portpolio_file}, REWARDING = #{rewarding}, HANDICAP = #{handicap}, MILITARY = #{military}, DELFLAG = 'N' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE APPLICATION SET RECRUIT_SEQ = #{recruit_seq} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CAREER c WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
